scripts.test:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d frontend-dev backend-dev test-database
scripts.test:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d frontend-prod backend-prod test-database
scripts.test:with-docker: npm run test:dev && sleep 10 && npm run test:quick && npm run test:down
scripts.test:full-pipeline: npm run test:dev && sleep 10 && npm run test && npm run test:down && npm run test:prod && sleep 15 && npm run test:quick && npm run test:down
scripts.install:all: npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.health: docker-compose exec backend curl -f http://localhost:5000/health && docker-compose exec frontend curl -f http://localhost:80/health
